amendment.description: To provide for a report on common geospatial awareness of critical infrastructure.

action.text: Amendment SA 3589, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3589 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3589 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9194) To provide for a report on common geospatial awareness of critical infrastructure.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3589 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3589 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Allard.
